title: [1.2.5]濒危动物
author: alan
txt_content:
本帖最后由 alan 于 2012-5-30 14:49 编辑 

嗯，请注意！这是1.2.5的mod！！！！！！！！

可以肯定的是，生物在Minecraft中是不可或缺的一样东西，它为游戏添加了不少乐趣。另外一款更多生物MOD，就添加了很多新生物到Minecraft中，我还没来得及了解那个MOD的所有生物，又发现了这款有趣的MOD，濒危动物，顾名思义，它这里添加的都是一些快灭绝的动物，在现实生活中，我们或许很难见到他们，但是有了这款MOD，你可以在游戏中拥有这些生物。不过保护动物人人有责，回到现实中，我们还是要爱护动物。那么喜欢的玩家，赶紧下载试试驯服这些生物吧！
动物包括:


企鹅，骆驼，鹰，犀鸟,熊猫,大象,长颈鹿,吼猴,卷尾猴,长臂猿猴子，雪豹，貘，北极熊，鸭嘴兽，小袋鼠 。

物品掉落
 Bamboo竹子 – 熊猫掉落
用处:合成竹笋汤， 枪，吹管和飞镖，喂食大熊猫 Bamboo soup竹笋汤
用处: 食物 (4血)
Craft: Bamboo on top of bowl 
 Blowpipe吹管
用处:发射飞镖
Craft: 3 bamboo in vertical line Panda meatXX肉（怕被和谐） – 熊猫掉落
用处: 食物 (3血) Cooked panda meat 熟的XX肉 Dart飞镖
用处: 从吹管射出
Craft: Flint on top of bamboo on top of feather/black feather 矛
用处: 投掷
Craft: Flint on top of bamboo on top of bamboo Banana香蕉 – 猴子掉落
Used: To eat (heals 2 hearts), to breed monkeys Monkey meat 猴子（和谐）肉- 猴子掉落
Used: To eat (Heals 3 hearts) Cooked monkey meat 熟的XX肉- 猴子掉落
Used: To eat (heals 5 hearts)
Craft: Cook monkey meat Black feather黑色羽毛 - 巨嘴鸟
Used:跟普通羽毛一样 (replaces feathers in any recipe) Polar bear meat 熊（和谐）肉—- 北极熊掉落
Used: To eat (heals 4 hearts) Cooked polar bear meat – 熟的XX肉
Used: To eat (heals 6 hearts)
Craft: Cook polar bear meat Giraffe meat – 还是肉
Used: To eat (heals 3 hearts) Cooked giraffe meat – 肉啊！dropped by giraffes when burned
Used: To eat (heals 5 hearts) Tusk -象牙
Used: To craft daggers Dagger匕首
用处： 武器 (has the same durability and does the same damage as an iron sword)
Craft: Tusk on top of a stick OR eagle claw on top of a stick Elephant fat肉 – dropped by elephants
Used: As a furnace fuel (smelts 6 items) Penguin fat 肉- dropped by penguins
Used: As a furnace fuel (smelts 4 items) Wallaby meat肉 – dropped by wallabies
Used: To eat (heals 3 hearts) Cooked wallaby meat肉 – dropped by wallabies when burned
Used: To eat (heals 5 hearts)
Craft: Cook wallaby meat Claw爪子 - 由鹰和雪豹掉落
用处: 合成匕首 Camel bag骆驼袋
Used: To give camels an inventory
Crafted: 8 leather in a square, with a gold nugget in the middle of them Lead绳子
Used: To toggle camels to follow/stay
Craft: 3 string in vertical line Tapir fat 肉- dropped by tapirs
Used – As a furnace fuel (smelts 5 items)下面是各种蛋！ Panda spawn egg Howler spawn egg Capuchin spawn egg Gibbon spawn egg Elephant spawn egg Giraffe spawn egg Penguin spawn egg Toucan spawn egg Giant panda spawn egg Polar bear spawn egg Wallaby spawn egg Eagle spawn egg Platypus spawn egg Tapir spawn egg Camel spawn egg Snow leopard spawn egg图
http://forum.gamer.com.tw/G2.php?bsn=18673&parent=50&sn=1672&lorder=9
1.2.5
求人气！！
